page.title: 08BURTON SALMON FARMERS 2
page.content: Mr.Atkinson was born on a farm and went to University to study farming.He has now been a farmer for 20 years. He works from a quarter to eight until four o'clock, but he says when you have your own farm you never really stop thinking about it. He likes farming very much, especially harvest time when he sees the products of all of his hard work. One of the jobs that Mr.Atkinson likes the least is cleaning the pig stys out. He would like to breed more animals in the future. His main problem is subsidence and the using of pesticides which he does not agree with but has to use because of the great problems he has with pests on his crops.
